text:
Join us tomorrow, April 2nd, at 6 a.m. PT for a closer look at #NintendoSwitch2! The #NintendoDirect: Nintendo Switch 2 – 4.2.2025 livestream will be approximately 60 minutes long.

Watch it here: https://youtube.com/live/DXUmjX7DsP8…
An hour???? Boys we are FEASTING
my life has been so boring without your products. I will awake before the sun rises just for this. For Miyamoto.

60 minutes of excitement! I bet we'll see:
- Mario Kart 9
- More of Metroid Prime 4
- New 3D Mario
- Zelda Remake (Probably Ocarina of Time!)
- Game Cube added to NSO
- A ton of 3rd party games!
- The C button functionality
- A ton of accessory options like a 2nd screen!
